meanings.definition: Capable of being known or understood.
meanings.sent1: The answer to the math problem was knowable after studying it carefully.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were clear and knowable, making it easy to assemble the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The mystery of the missing sock was finally solved when its hiding spot became knowable.
meanings.sent4: The truth behind the legend was knowable only to those who dared to seek it.
meanings.sent5: The path to success may seem daunting, but with hard work, it becomes knowable and achievable.

meanings.definition: Able to be discovered or learned.
meanings.sent1: The ancient artifact was knowable through careful excavation and research.
meanings.sent2: The history of the town was knowable through old documents and stories passed down.
meanings.sent3: The secret recipe for the delicious cookies was finally knowable after years of searching.
meanings.sent4: The hidden treasure was knowable to those who followed the map's clues.
meanings.sent5: The truth about the mysterious noise in the attic was finally knowable after investigating it thoroughly.
